name: Defyswap
description: We are operating in Echelon chain as the main, largest DEX and we are in discussion of incorporating more chains to our dex. In addition, DEX with Limit Order and CEX-like interface are a few key attributes posses in our DEX. And also, we have incorporated common features of DEX to DefySwap and NFT Staking next important add-on to our DEX. One of the supreme features is ILP( Impermanent loss protection) which help investors to cover their loss on the farm. Our key features are listed below, + CEX like Dex + NO tax for farm creating and breaking + Impermanent loss protection + Own chart + Launchpad + limit Order feature in DEX + Single Staking and FARM + Fixed Supply at given time + NFT staking
